mapper.sql: brand_id, brand_nickname, brand_name, brand_url, brand_logo, brand_prom_index, brand_sort, brand_seo_title, brand_seo_keyword, brand_seo_desc, brand_delflag, brand_create_name, brand_create_time, brand_modified_name, brand_modified_time, brand_del_name, brand_del_time,store_id
mapper.select: select count(1) from np_goods where brand_id=#{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and goods_belo = #{thirdId} and is_third='1' and goods_delflag='0'

select goods.brand_id,goods.brand_logo,goods.brand_nickname,goods.brand_name,goods.brand_url,goods.brand_sort ,grand.reason ,grand.rate_status from np_goods_brand goods,np_third_grandbrand grand where grand.brand_id=goods.brand_id and grand.del_flag='0'
and goods.brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where third_id=#{thirdId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND del_flag = '0' order by modify_time desc )
and goods.brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where rate_status=#{rateStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} (rate_status= '0' or rate_status='2' or del_flag = '0') )
and goods.brand_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and goods.brand_nickname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and goods.brand_sort = #{brandSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND third_id=#{thirdId,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY brand_id order by grand.modify_time desc limit #{startRowNum},#{endRowNum}

select goods.brand_id,goods.brand_logo,goods.brand_nickname,goods.brand_name,goods.brand_url,goods.brand_sort ,grand.reason ,grand.rate_status from np_goods_brand goods,np_third_grandbrand grand where grand.brand_id=goods.brand_id and grand.del_flag='0' and goods.brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where rate_status='1' order by modify_time desc )
and goods.brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where third_id=#{thirdId,jdbcType=CHAR} order by modify_time desc )
GROUP BY brand_id order by grand.modify_time desc

select count(*) from np_goods_brand where 1=1 and brand_delflag = "0"
and brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where del_flag='0')
and brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where third_id=#{thirdId,jdbcType=CHAR} and del_flag='0' )
and brand_id in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where rate_status=#{rateStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} (rate_status= '0' or rate_status='2') )
and brand_id not in (select brand_id from np_third_grandbrand where third_id=#{thirdId,jdbcType=CHAR} and del_flag='0') and store_id IS NULL
and brand_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and brand_nickname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brandNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
